Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class DrawFrame extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • drawPanel

          DrawPanel drawPanel
          DrawPanel - the smart panel that can draw shapes on itself and allowing us to do it with our mouse.

        • undoButton

          javax.swing.JButton undoButton
          undoButton - the JButton that manages the undo - removing the last shape drawn.

        • clearButton

          javax.swing.JButton clearButton
          clearButton - the JButton that clears the DrawPanel completley.

        • colorChoices

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> colorChoices
          colorChoices - the JComboBox containing all the color choices that user can use.

        • shapeChoices

          javax.swing.JComboBox<E> shapeChoices
          shapeChoices - the JComboBox containing all the shape types that the user can draw.

        • filledCheckBox

          javax.swing.JCheckBox filledCheckBox
          filledCheckBox - the JCheckBox to set whether the shape will be filled or not.

    • Class DrawPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • shapes

          MyShape[] shapes
          shapes - the array of shapes that was drawn.

        • shapeCount

          int shapeCount
          shapeCount - the count of the shapes that was drawn.

        • statusLabel

          javax.swing.JLabel statusLabel
          statusLabel - will store the statusLabel from the parent window (DrawFrame) in order to upate it.

        • maxShapeNum

          int maxShapeNum
          maxShapeNum - The maximum shapes that can be drawn.

        • shapeType

          int shapeType
          shapeType - The type of current shape that will be drawn.

        • filledShape

          boolean filledShape
          filledShape - Whether the shape that will be drawn is filled or not.

        • currentColor

          java.awt.Color currentColor
          currentColor - The current color of the current shape

        • parentWindow

          javax.swing.JFrame parentWindow
          parentWindow - The parent's window (DrawFrame) reference for the pop up messages

        • currentShape

          MyShape currentShape
          currentShape - The Current drawing shape while mouse dragging
